content.title: Scheme of Internship for Post-Graduate/Research Students
content.department: Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
content.details: The Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation (MoSPI) is implementing a scheme of Internship for Post-graduate/Research Students of Statistics/ Mathematical Statistics/Operations Research/ Economics/ Demography or any of the applied fields of Statistics of recognized Universities/Institutions during 2023-24. The scheme aims to facilitate students in familiarizing themselves with the Official Statistical System in the Country.
benefits: A token stipend of ₹10,000/- (consolidated) @ ₹5,000/- per month.
Certificate issued upon successful completion of the internship.
Additional amount of ₹250/- per day for field visits (maximum of 10 days).
Minimum logistics support provided by internship offices.
eligibility: The applicant should be a citizen of India.

Must be pursuing post-graduation/research from a recognized College/University/Research institute in Statistics/ Mathematical Statistics/Operational Research/Economics/Demography or any of the applied fields of Statistics.
exclusions: If any intern leaves or discontinues the internship in between, they will not be entitled to any stipend/certificate.
The award of internship does not guarantee any job in the Government of India.
content.application_process: Online application process through the National Career Service (NCS) Portal.
documents_required: Duly filled in and signed/attested application form.
Proof of the Latest Educational Qualification (Marksheets of the last 3 years)
Self-attested copy of Identity Card issued during PG Course/Research.
No-Objection Letter from the Institute/Head of Department.

faqs.question: What Are The Objectives Of The Scheme?
faqs.answer: To facilitate students in familiarizing themselves with the Official Statistical System in the Country.

faqs.question: How Many Total Slots Are There In This Internship Scheme?
faqs.answer: The total available number of internships during 2023-24 would be 193.

faqs.question: Will The Amount Of The Token Stipend Be Paid As A Lump Sum Or In Installments?
faqs.answer: A token stipend of ₹10,000/- (consolidated) @ ₹5,000/- per month would be paid at the end of the internship period.

faqs.question: Will MoSPI Pay Travelling Allowance Or Daily Allowance To The Interns?
faqs.answer: No Travelling Allowance or Daily Allowance will be paid.
